Want_update_airplane: Do you want to update this airplane?
Want_delete_airplane: Do you want to delete this airplane?
Airplane_no_list: There are no items in the list
Want_add_airplane: Do you want to add this airplane?
Airplane_fields_required: All fields are required. Please fill them to proceed.
How_view_Airplane: How to view the Airplane List?
How_add_Airplane: How to add the new Airplane?
How_view_Airplane_detail: The Airplane List would show the whole screen on the Phone, but on a Tablet or Desktop screen, it would show the List on the left screen.
How_add_Airplane_detail: You can click the button: 'Add Airplane' in the bottom, a add page will show in the screen, then you can add new Airplane with information of: airplane type, the number of passengers, the maximum speed, and the range or distance the plane can fly. And click the 'Submit the new Airplane Type' button to add it.
How_update_Airplane_detail: You can tap the Airplane list (e.g.: Airplane Type 1: XXX) to see details of each item, and a detailed page will show in the screen. Update any information you need, and then click the 'Update' button to update the Airplane.
How_delete_Airplane_detail: You can tap the Airplane list (e.g.: Airplane Type 1: XXX) to see details of each item, and a detailed page will show in the screen. and then click the 'Delete' button to delete the Airplane.
reservation_hint: Select a reservation from the list to view the detail
reservation_no_data: There are no items in the listÔºÅ
reservation_add_alert: Are you sure to save this reservation info?
how_view_reservation_list: The Reservation List would show the whole screen on the Phone, but on a Tablet or Desktop screen, it would show the List on the left screen.
how_add_reservation: You can click the button: "Add New Reservation" in the bottom, a add page will show in the screen, you can add new Reservation with information of: customer name, flight, and departure date, Then click the "Submit" button to add it.
how_view_reservation_detail: You can tap one of reservation from the reservation list: a reservation page will show in the screen, but on a Tablet or Desktop screen, it would show the List on the left screen. You can click the "Go back" button to return to list page.
how_view_reservation_list_: How to view the Reservation List?
how_add_reservation_: How to add a new Reservation?
how_view_reservation_detail_: How to view a Reservation detail?
prompt_user_choice: Do you want to start with a blank page or copy the fields from the previous customer?
no_items: There are no items in the list
ask_add_customer_info: Do you want to add this customer info?
fill_customer_fields: Please fill in all customer fields.
ask_update_customer: Do you want to update this customer's information?
ask_delete_customer: Do you want to delete this customer's information?
how_view_customer_list: How to view the Customer List?
view_customer_list: The Customer List would show the whole screen on the Phone, but on a Tablet or Desktop screen, it would show the List on the left screen.
add_customer_list: You can click the button: "Add" in the bottom, a add page will show in the screen, you can add new Customer with information of: first name, last name, address, and birthday. And click the "Submit" button to add it.
update_customer_list: You can tap the Customer list to see details of each customer, and a detailed page will show in the screen. And then click the "Update" button to delete the customer.
delete_customer_list: You can tap the Customer list to see details of each customer, and a detailed page will show in the screen. And then click the "Delete" button to delete the customer.
flight_no_data: There are no flights in the list, click 'Add Flight' button below to add a new flight
flight_add_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to add this flight?
flight_update_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to update this flight?
flight_delete_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to delete this flight?
flight_view_message: Select a flight from the list to view the details
flight_how_add_title: How to add a new flight?
flight_how_add: Click the 'Add Flight' button, fill in all the fields and click "Submit". Then click "Yes" to confirm adding the flight, or "No" to cancel.
flight_how_view: Simply click on the flight you want to view in the list, it will go to the details page automatically.
flight_how_update: Go to the details page of the flight you want to update. Fill in the information and click "Update Flight", then click "Yes" to confirm the update, or "No" to cancel.
flight_how_delete: Go to the details page of the flight you want to delete. Click "Delete Flight", then click "Yes" to confirm the deletion, or "No" to cancel.

homepage_para2: We will take you anywhere in Middle-earth with the utmost care!
homepage_para3: Come and experience a once-in-a-lifetime unforgettable flight!
